**银剑**（silver saber）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是单手武器，由[银](/index.php?title=%E9%93%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "银 (page does not exist)")制成，且使用[佩剑](/wiki/%E4%BD%A9%E5%89%91 "佩剑")技能。

[夜刃](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9C%E5%88%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "夜刃 (page does not exist)")和[兽化人之灾](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E5%8C%96%E4%BA%BA%E4%B9%8B%E7%81%BE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽化人之灾 (page does not exist)")是两种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类银剑。

## 佩剑技能

| 佩剑   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

银剑是游戏中唯一使用佩剑技能的武器。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

[短弯刀](/wiki/%E7%9F%AD%E5%BC%AF%E5%88%80 "短弯刀")现在使用佩剑技能。野蛮人现在可以将佩剑技能提升到熟练等级。（[commit 296a3ac2](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/296a3ac246ae12218eccff46d3ef79f46eb9068f)）

## 生成

银剑在随机生成武器中占比0.6%。[警卫员队长](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员队长 (page does not exist)")和[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")上尉有1⁄2的概率在生成时[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把银剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

若[兽人镇](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人镇 (page does not exist)")在游戏中生成，其中出现的[兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")有1⁄2的概率携带原本由警卫员队长持有的银剑[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有低于1%的概率携带银剑[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

## 策略

银剑因其自身的性能而成为热门的武器，因其对排斥银器的怪物（如[魂灵](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%82%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魂灵 (page does not exist)")、[恶魔](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶魔 (page does not exist)")、[兽化人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E5%8C%96%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽化人 (page does not exist)")和[吸血鬼](/index.php?title=%E5%90%B8%E8%A1%80%E9%AC%BC%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吸血鬼（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")）能造成额外伤害，也是[双持武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%8C%81%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双持武器 (page does not exist)")时的优选。但由于它极少随机生成，玩家通常会考虑击杀[矿坑镇](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矿坑镇 (page does not exist)")的警卫员队长来获得它，如果不想遭受阵营值惩罚，也可利用强力的宠物击杀。

如果运气不好，没有在前期找到银剑，你也可以在[吕底人堡垒](/index.php?title=%E5%90%95%E5%BA%95%E4%BA%BA%E5%A0%A1%E5%9E%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吕底人堡垒 (page does not exist)")（如果它有生成）里碰碰运气，或者也有可能在进入[葛汉诺姆](/index.php?title=%E8%91%9B%E6%B1%89%E8%AF%BA%E5%A7%86\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "葛汉诺姆 (page does not exist)")之前遇到一两个上尉。

### 平均伤害计算

下表的平均伤害计算不计入来自武器[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")、[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")，或[祝福](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "祝福 (page does not exist)")的武器攻击[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")或[恶魔](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶魔 (page does not exist)")的额外伤害加成。

| 武器   | 不排斥银器                                                                                   | 排斥银器                                                                                                 |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| +0银剑 | ![\frac{1+8}{2}=\bold{4.5}](/images/math/7/4/e/74e52834efa4174097be171735147333.png)    | ![\frac{1+8}{2}+\frac{1+20}{2}=\bold{15}](/images/math/4/9/1/491c20d97696fb10367b0beedba5b863.png)   |
| +7银剑 | ![\frac{1+8}{2}+7=\bold{11.5}](/images/math/9/4/7/94719b6068eeb41a5cfcaa5634e6b33a.png) | ![\frac{1+8}{2}+\frac{1+20}{2}+7=\bold{22}](/images/math/d/d/0/dd0a3763357b07369642322d748ddf8b.png) |

## 历史

银剑首次在[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")出现，同时夜刃也在该版本出现。兽化人之灾在此前的[基础物品](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "基础物品 (page does not exist)")是[长剑](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E5%89%91 "长剑")，在该版本中也成为了银剑。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Saber](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saber "wikipedia:Saber")***

佩剑（saber，或sabre）是一种单侧开刃，刀刃弯曲的剑。其护手与剑柄末端的球状物连接。它的设计源自西亚的[短弯刀](/wiki/%E7%9F%AD%E5%BC%AF%E5%88%80 "短弯刀")，这种刀也有类似的护手。

佩剑的刃通常是向后弯曲的，与很多类似的剑相反。佩剑主要为骑兵使用，例如16至19世纪欧洲中部的骠骑兵和轻骑兵。由于火器的发展使得很多护甲的效果下降，佩剑的护手得到了增强。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Silver_saber/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") often change the item's name to the **saber**, and may also change its default material of [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron"), giving it the possibility of generating as silver. Some variants also add more weapons that use the saber skill.

In variants that incorporate the [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict") role, [prison guards](/wiki/Prison_guard "Prison guard") have a 1⁄2 chance of being generated with a silver saber.

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds the [rapier](/wiki/Rapier "Rapier") as a weapon that uses the saber skill.

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), silver sabers are replaced with iron sabers. Grayswandir retains its silver damage as a unique property of the artifact, rather than an intrinsic property of the base item. The scimitar skill is also merged into the saber skill.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the silver saber is simply known as a saber, but has a default material of silver and always shows the material's name. dNetHack also adds the rapier, [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber#dNetHack "Lightsaber"), [crow-quill](/index.php?title=Crow-quill\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Crow-quill (page does not exist)") and [rakuyo](/wiki/Rakuyo "Rakuyo") as new weapons that use the saber skill. The basic lightsaber is the only one of its weapon type that uses the saber skill, and the rakuyo can be detached into two weapons: a rakuyo-saber form for the main hand, and a rakuyo-dagger for the off-hand.

Several artifacts use the saber skill in some form:

- [Demonbane](/wiki/Demonbane "Demonbane") has its base item changed to a silver saber from vanilla *NetHack*.
- [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand") and [Frost Brand](/wiki/Frost_Brand "Frost Brand") can generate in saber form.
- The [Blade Singer's Saber](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Blade_Singer.27s_Saber "DNetHack artifacts") is an artifact rakuyo that also unrestricts the saber skill if gifted.
- The [Crescent Blade](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Crescent_Blade "DNetHack artifacts") is an artifact silver saber that favors [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)").
- [The Annulus](/wiki/The_Annulus "The Annulus") is the [Anachrononaut](/wiki/Anachrononaut "Anachrononaut") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") and can be invoked to change between a variety of forms at will, including a lightsaber.
- [The Iconoclast](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Iconoclast "DNetHack artifacts") is an artifact silver saber wielded by [Daemon](/wiki/Daemon "Daemon").
- The [Saber of Sabaoth](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Saber_of_Sabaoth "DNetHack artifacts") is a large artifact silver saber that [Throne Archons](/wiki/Throne_Archon "Throne Archon") can generate with.

[The Air Crystal](/wiki/Crystals_\(dNetHack\) "Crystals (dNetHack)") boosts your skill in sabers by one level while carried.

The [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") [Berith](/wiki/Berith "Berith") grants skill in sabers while bound, and a saber is one of the items that his seal can be drawn around in order to summon him.

[Argentum golems](/wiki/Argentum_golem "Argentum golem") have a 1⁄12 chance of generating with a silver saber. The [Rebel Ringleader](/wiki/Rebel_Ringleader "Rebel Ringleader"), the [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis") for the default [Noble quest](/wiki/Noble_quest "Noble quest"), will always generate with a silver saber.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), sabers have a default material of iron and can generate as silver. Grayswandir and Werebane are still generated as silver sabers.

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") merges the scimitar skill into the saber skill.

Sabers have a default material of iron and can generate as silver. Grayswandir and Werebane are still generated as silver sabers. A saber can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") and a scimitar; a [fauchard](/wiki/Fauchard "Fauchard") can be created by combining a saber with a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), the [Mouser's Scalpel](/wiki/Mouser%27s_Scalpel "Mouser's Scalpel") and [Queen's Guard](/wiki/Queen%27s_Guard "Queen's Guard") are artifacts that use the saber skill.

The Rebel Ringleader retains her silver saber and serves as the nemesis for all Nobles.

### Hack'EM

[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") the rapier from SLASH'EM and the [falchion](/wiki/Falchion "Falchion") from [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") as weapons that use the saber skill, and merges the scimitar skill (which SpliceHack falchions use) into the saber skill.

Sabers behave as in EvilHack and use the same forging recipes. [Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a saber will produce a rapier, and vice versa.

## 百科文本

Flashed all their sabres bare,  
Flashed as they turned in air,  
Sab'ring the gunners there,  
Charging an army, while  
All the world wondered:  
Plunged in the battery smoke,  
Right through the line they broke;  
Cossack and Russian  
Reeled from the sabre-stroke  
Shattered and sundered.  
Then they rode back, but not--  
Not the six hundred.

\[ The Charge of the Light Brigade, by Alfred, Lord Tennyson ]

银剑（silver saber）是NetHack中的一种武器。它是单手武器，由银制成，且使用佩剑技能。

夜刃和兽化人之灾是两种神器类银剑。

银剑是游戏中唯一使用佩剑技能的武器。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

短弯刀现在使用佩剑技能。野蛮人现在可以将佩剑技能提升到熟练等级。（commit 296a3ac2）

生成

银剑在随机生成武器中占比0.6%。警卫员队长和岩德军团上尉有1⁄2的概率在生成时获得一把银剑[1]。

若兽人镇在游戏中生成，其中出现的兽人队长有1⁄2的概率携带原本由警卫员队长持有的银剑[2]。

所有玩家怪物在生成时有低于1%的概率携带银剑[3]。

策略

银剑因其自身的性能而成为热门的武器，因其对排斥银器的怪物（如魂灵、恶魔、兽化人和吸血鬼）能造成额外伤害，也是双持武器时的优选。但由于它极少随机生成，玩家通常会考虑击杀矿坑镇的警卫员队长来获得它，如果不想遭受阵营值惩罚，也可利用强力的宠物击杀。

如果运气不好，没有在前期找到银剑，你也可以在吕底人堡垒（如果它有生成）里碰碰运气，或者也有可能在进入葛汉诺姆之前遇到一两个上尉。

平均伤害计算

下表的平均伤害计算不计入来自武器技能、力量，或祝福的武器攻击亡灵或恶魔的额外伤害加成。

武器 不排斥银器 排斥银器
+0银剑
+7银剑

历史

银剑首次在NetHack 3.1.0出现，同时夜刃也在该版本出现。兽化人之灾在此前的基础物品是长剑，在该版本中也成为了银剑。

起源

维基百科相关条目：
Saber

佩剑（saber，或sabre）是一种单侧开刃，刀刃弯曲的剑。其护手与剑柄末端的球状物连接。它的设计源自西亚的短弯刀，这种刀也有类似的护手。

佩剑的刃通常是向后弯曲的，与很多类似的剑相反。佩剑主要为骑兵使用，例如16至19世纪欧洲中部的骠骑兵和轻骑兵。由于火器的发展使得很多护甲的效果下降，佩剑的护手得到了增强。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Variants with object materials often change the item's name to the saber, and may also change its default material of iron, giving it the possibility of generating as silver. Some variants also add more weapons that use the saber skill.

In variants that incorporate the Convict role, prison guards have a 1⁄2 chance of being generated with a silver saber.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM adds the rapier as a weapon that uses the saber skill.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, silver sabers are replaced with iron sabers. Grayswandir retains its silver damage as a unique property of the artifact, rather than an intrinsic property of the base item. The scimitar skill is also merged into the saber skill.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the silver saber is simply known as a saber, but has a default material of silver and always shows the material's name. dNetHack also adds the rapier, lightsaber, crow-quill and rakuyo as new weapons that use the saber skill. The basic lightsaber is the only one of its weapon type that uses the saber skill, and the rakuyo can be detached into two weapons: a rakuyo-saber form for the main hand, and a rakuyo-dagger for the off-hand.

Several artifacts use the saber skill in some form:

  • Demonbane has its base item changed to a silver saber from vanilla NetHack.
  • Fire Brand and Frost Brand can generate in saber form.
  • The Blade Singer's Saber is an artifact rakuyo that also unrestricts the saber skill if gifted.
  • The Crescent Blade is an artifact silver saber that favors drow.
  • The Annulus is the Anachrononaut quest artifact and can be invoked to change between a variety of forms at will, including a lightsaber.
  • The Iconoclast is an artifact silver saber wielded by Daemon.
  • The Saber of Sabaoth is a large artifact silver saber that Throne Archons can generate with.

The Air Crystal boosts your skill in sabers by one level while carried.

The spirit Berith grants skill in sabers while bound, and a saber is one of the items that his seal can be drawn around in order to summon him.

Argentum golems have a 1⁄12 chance of generating with a silver saber. The Rebel Ringleader, the quest nemesis for the default Noble quest, will always generate with a silver saber.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, sabers have a default material of iron and can generate as silver. Grayswandir and Werebane are still generated as silver sabers.

EvilHack

EvilHack merges the scimitar skill into the saber skill.

Sabers have a default material of iron and can generate as silver. Grayswandir and Werebane are still generated as silver sabers. A saber can be created at a forge by combining a long sword and a scimitar; a fauchard can be created by combining a saber with a spear.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, the Mouser's Scalpel and Queen's Guard are artifacts that use the saber skill.

The Rebel Ringleader retains her silver saber and serves as the nemesis for all Nobles.

Hack'EM

Hack'EM the rapier from SLASH'EM and the falchion from SpliceHack as weapons that use the saber skill, and merges the scimitar skill (which SpliceHack falchions use) into the saber skill.

Sabers behave as in EvilHack and use the same forging recipes. Upgrading a saber will produce a rapier, and vice versa.

百科文本

Flashed all their sabres bare,
Flashed as they turned in air,
Sab'ring the gunners there,
Charging an army, while
All the world wondered:
Plunged in the battery smoke,
Right through the line they broke;
Cossack and Russian
Reeled from the sabre-stroke
Shattered and sundered.
Then they rode back, but not--
Not the six hundred.

[ The Charge of the Light Brigade, by Alfred, Lord Tennyson ]
